reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Brilliant Illumination and Classic Design
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the Bedside Table Lamp with 3 Dimmable Settings from Amazon, and it has proven to be an outstanding addition to my bedroom decor. Here's why I'm giving it a glowing 5-star review:Elegant Design (5/5):The design of this bedside lamp is simply stunning. It seamlessly blends modern aesthetics with a touch of sophistication, adding a subtle yet elegant accent to my bedroom. The choice of materials and the attention to detail in the craftsmanship are truly impressive.Customizable Lighting (5/5):The three dimmable settings provide a perfect solution for various lighting needs. Whether I'm winding down with a book, setting a cozy ambiance, or need bright illumination for a task, this lamp easily adapts to my preferences. The versatility in lighting options is a standout feature.Easy to Use (5/5):Operating the lamp is a breeze. The touch-sensitive controls make it incredibly user-friendly, allowing me to effortlessly adjust the brightness levels with just a tap. The intuitive design enhances the overall user experience.Adjustable Height (5/5):The adjustable height feature is a thoughtful addition. It allows me to customize the lamp's position according to my needs, whether I'm reading in bed or using it as ambient lighting. This flexibility adds to the functionality of the lamp.Sturdy Build (5/5):The lamp feels well-built and sturdy. The base provides a stable foundation, and the adjustable parts move smoothly without any wobbling. It's evident that the lamp is crafted with durability in mind, ensuring long-term satisfaction.Energy-Efficient (5/5):I appreciate the energy-efficient nature of this lamp. The LED technology not only provides bright and clear illumination but also ensures that I won't be constantly changing bulbs. It's a small yet impactful feature that contributes to the lamp's overall value.Value for Money (5/5):Considering the elegant design, customizable lighting options, and overall quality, the Bedside Table Lamp offers excellent value for money. It's a high-quality lighting solution that doesn't compromise on style or functionality.Conclusion:In conclusion, the Bedside Table Lamp with 3 Dimmable Settings has exceeded my expectations in every aspect. It's not just a source of light; it's a stylish and versatile piece that enhances the ambiance of my bedroom. If you're in search of a bedside lamp that combines aesthetic appeal with practical functionality, this is an absolute winner. A well-deserved 5 stars!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect size and exceptional deal for the money!
reviews.reviewText: These are great little desk and nightstand lamps. The added power plug really adds value. They even come with a bulb…which surprised me. Great amount of light actually. I have one on nightstand and one on desk across the room. If I need full light in the room I use both. I rarely use my overhead light anymore!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good for price
reviews.reviewText: They are small for a bedroom but good on a small nightstand. ❤️ that the LEDS change color 💡

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good little light. I wish the touch sensitivity was a little better, but I would buy again.
reviews.reviewText: Light does everything it claims to do. Main regular size LED bulb is included. It is just a regular dimmable LED bulb that the lamp dims for three brightness levels that are selected by multiple taps on the base. First touch is dim, second brighter and third brightest. Fourth touch turns it off.The salt rocks are pretty much as pictured. There is a good variety of sizes of the rocks. This is needed as the space at the bottom for the rocks is skinner than towards the top due to the inner part. So you have to put the smaller pieces down at the bottom and use larger ones as you fill it up. Nice effect and dims with the knob with a detented off position from very dim to decently bright. Certainly not enough to read by but bright enough for a pretty cool "ambience" and works well as a night light (other than you have to adjust brightness each time you turn it on. The post part of the lamp works for touching as well but it is even less sensitive there. I pretty much had to grab with a couple fingers for that to work so I don't see that being to useful for many people.Tried all the electrical. The A and C USB ports worked. I did not check for high speed charging or anything like that. The AC outlet worked too.What would I change? I'd improve the touch sensitivity. This may be different on each lamp or in different climates but hear in the desert I had to touch for longer than an instant for the touch to be recognized. Not long enough to be truly annoying but long enough that you have to get used to it which happens pretty quickly. I was definitely touch too fast early on and had to slow down. Not a show stopper though. I would give it a "memory" so once you select a brightness level and it has been left at that level for some amount of time (10 seconds? 30 seconds?) then the next touch would turn it off. Then when you turn it back on it would go to that same brightness level. As long as you don't do multiple touches too quickly then it would just be an on and off.All in all, well worth the money spent. Would buy again if I needed another table lamp.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lightweight but sturdy
reviews.reviewText: The lamps came very well packed including the lightbulbs. They feel lightweight but sturdy, the lampshade is very firm and seems well made from a durable material. It says it includes an instruction manual, but there’s really no instructions and little details in a single small sheet of paper. That being said, it’s probably easy to figure out how to set them up and the light changing settings.I would prefer another way of changing the light setting other than turning it on and off, but it does work well and having a plug in the lamp is very convenient for a nightstand.Still, I think it’s a good value for the price and would purchase again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Side table lamp
reviews.reviewText: Very nice , nicely made. I like the size and bonus feature , phone plug to charge your phone. 2 settings for the light, warm and bright.Highly recommended

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Very Cheaply Made
reviews.reviewText: Obviously, for the price, I didn't have high expectations. I ordered the "wood" base version and it was not wood but a wood looking vinyl wrap type thing. Very light. One of them was missing the little pad on the bottom that helps keep it from sliding, and scratching, the surface of whatever you set them on. The plug in cords are VERY short...I had to swap out the cords from my old lamps to these ones so that I didn't have to come up with more extension cords for them... very short cords. They do work though, and the 3 levels of light are fairly nice. Very light pieces so just be careful where you put them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These lamps Come with light bulbs and are very easy to put together. Put out plenty of light and has a couple different shades of light after turning off and on.

reviews.reviewText: Esta muy bonita, le puse un foco Led azul, vienen los dos focos y las dos lámparas, todo muy bien empacado están chicas pero están perfectas para lámpara de cabecera
Muy lindas las lamparas a tiempo la enytrega y sin defecto alguno, tal cual viene en la imagen
Me gusto que está muy practica para armar, pero me hubiera gustado que tuviera entradas USB para conectar mi lap o mi ipad.
Excelentes, estoy en enero y siguen funcionando sin problemas
